com.Interface.Employee.services

Interface EmployeeService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmployeeServiceImpl

    public interface EmployeeService
    Contains methods that works as adapter between Employee controller and DAO.

    It have five main methods for: adding new Employee, update an Employee, gets all Employees, get Employee by ID and Delete an Employee.

    Author:
    Ahmed A.Moniem Hassan
    See Also:
    EmployeeDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEmloyee(Employee employee)
      Adding new Employee by taking an Employee object and submit it's properties value to saved as a record in database.
      java.util.List<Employee> allEmloyees()
      Get all Employees from database.
      void deleteEmployee(int emp_id)
      Delete Employee with the given Employee ID from database.
      Employee getEmployeeById(int emp_id)
      Get Employee by the given Employee ID.
      void updateEmployee(Employee employee)
      Updating/Editing an Employee by taking an Employee object, take the given id property with the object to search for it's record in database, and change record data with other object properties value.

        void addEmloyee(Employee employee)

      • updateEmployee

        void updateEmployee(Employee employee)
        Updating/Editing an Employee by taking an Employee object, take the given id property with the object to search for it's record in database, and change record data with other object properties value.
        Parameters:
        Employee - object contains the data that must be updated.
